website_summaries.verdict: Designed to keep battery chamber off wet counters - which compromises many competitors. Still, some users criticize its longevity.
pros: Infrared sensor can detect hand almost 4 inches away
Designed with battery chamber at top to keep water away
Sensor is hard to trigger accidentally, so less waste and mess
cons: Requires thinner soap to prevent clogs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for the first couple weeks. We set the amount to where we like it, Now soap barely comes out. We get little amounts and have to make it squirt 5 or 6x. It’s too late to return this item. For a $24 soap dispenser, I’d expect it to last for more than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far with this soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I like that the battery compartment is not on the bottom. The sensor is very good, not overly sensitive like previous soap dispensers I have owned. I have not been using it long enough to know whether the nozzle will become clog-prone, but so far I am very pleased with sturdy dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: One at every sink
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these at every sink. We got the first one to help little one learning hand washing, but liked it so much we now have one at every sink. They aren’t too large, work well, and I like that it is touch-free. The only downside is that they are a little too-heavy. That led to me accidentally knocking one over and the soap holder breaking. I contacted Secura and was able to purchase a replacement from them.
customer_reviews.author: MP 123108

customer_reviews.title: Still have it, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this a couple months now, most soaps do not work. Too thick. the amount that comes out is minimal. I've tried different soaps and still get a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Really a pleasant surprise. This dispenser is nice looking and works great. It even has settings for soap output which is surprising given the price. I bought this while waiting for a replacement for a $60 dispenser that died, I may just put that one in the closet for now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Henderson

customer_reviews.title: So nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this soap dispenser. I only have the use of one arm, so ordinary tasks become challenges for me. This device helps. Plus it's a nicely designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Careful buyer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: So literally like everyone said on their reviews 😒 THIS THING STOPS WORKING! SO ANNOYING! Tried everything new batteries! NOP cleaning it out after 2 days NOP! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Azmaveth Camberos

customer_reviews.title: Really great soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dispenser because it is touchless, holds a good amount of soap and dispenses just the right amount. It also looks very nice on my sink. In fact, I ordered another one and plan to order 2 more so I have them everywhere I need them.
customer_reviews.author: grandma0405

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work
customer_reviews.text: Placed all new batteries in and soap and have not work. Waste my money buying this. Would like to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this product so far. It adds a nice little fancy look to my kitchen. I like that I don't have to touch the soap dispenser to get soap out, so the touchless feature is the best part. I have had no issues with it so far. The soap that I use comes out a little runny, but that could just be the soap that I used. Will try another brand next time for soap.
customer_reviews.author: Arieana

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but stopped working now but too late to return. Tilted it over and soap ran out from underneath. My recommendation is do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MeDon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap dispenser. It looks modern and clean. Works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t a bad product, but the sensor definitely sucks. Could barely get it to work & Ive even changed batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Several Months
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for several months and then the motor quit working. I tried to contact the supplier and received no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Run4fun

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought 3 of them.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. The kids love it so they wash their hands more.
customer_reviews.author: Dona J.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. Setup was easy and soap came out just right.
customer_reviews.author: MReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizing hands
customer_reviews.text: The importance of sanitizing hands during COVID-19 is made easy with this automatic dispenser. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Practical dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I Love the dispenser. Nice modern design, works well and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Imano

customer_reviews.title: hands free
customer_reviews.text: hands free,germ free,great for short term rentals,volume of soap control saves money in long run
customer_reviews.author: alan hlavac

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Secura I have bought. The first was for dish soap and now this is for the bathroom. What I love about it is you can easily change how much you want dispensed. It is not too sensitive. You actually need to put your hand near it. I had another brand and you barely needed to be near it and soap came out. My hand soap hasn't clogged. Extremely happy I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Lp Solutions

customer_reviews.title: I needed a touch free soap dispenser replacement, and this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace our old dispenser and decided to try this, it works great, and the battery compartment is located on top, so you wouldn’t get it wet. The only thing sometimes it doesn’t well is due to the thickness of the soap, it may take a few ‘suck’ to get the amount of soap you need for your hands, but overall definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wu

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. It is expensive, and it just quit after 4 months of use. My previous dispenser worked for 5 YEARS before it died. I changed batteries, twice. The first time there was a green ring shown, but every time it tried to trigger it it would turn red, and instead of the pump working I'd hear a squeal. After a while, even that stopped, so I changed batteries again. Terrible, especially given the extremely high price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Kolsky

customer_reviews.title: Never turned on from day one
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived, we filed with the soap, put in fresh batteries, then nothing. Never worked. We kept trying new batteries, but it never turned on in any form. We sent emails explaining the problem but have never heard back or been able to reach anyone. I’m sure that we just received a defective one that needs to be replaced. I’d be happy to change my review if they would respond and replace the defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Looks great however
customer_reviews.text: Too forceful. Spits out liquid soap, you have to catch it. I have 3 other Secura soap dispensers, they do not work like this one. Not happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on the sink top and delivers the perfect amount of soap each time it dispenses!
customer_reviews.author: Eric LoGiudice

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great! Exactly what we wanted. Works best with creamy style soap.
customer_reviews.author: logan5

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than measurements given
customer_reviews.text: This is 2" taller and wider than specified. I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: S. L.  Richards

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one month
customer_reviews.text: Cloggen and stopped working after one month. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: L.W

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is very convenient. Use it in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just wish the spout stuck out a little further.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lingard

customer_reviews.title: An Item To Have
customer_reviews.text: I liked the slick design of the dispenser. It does not take up much room sitting on my bathroom sink. Lather was nice and thick and held up during the entire hand washing. I have already told other people about this item.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Watts

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a good addition to any home if it worked. I tried all types of liquid hand soaps and new batteries and it didn’t work. I sent it back. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Potty

customer_reviews.title: Real nice product, a bit tall for a smaller sink
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it works great so far so good! It does look large on my pedestal sink..
customer_reviews.author: bbcoach

customer_reviews.title: Best soap dispenser out there.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful matte finish just sold it for me. Interesting enough there aren't a lot of options out there for this color. The location of the batteries was a winner too because it wont be prone to water damage unlike the competition. And not a lot of people talk about the LED lights. It makes it look so nice and futuristic.
customer_reviews.author: Amir A.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working before second refill.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working before second refill. Changed batteries twice, but still doesn’t work. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: H Monthomery

customer_reviews.title: Not good with Dawn Dish Soap
customer_reviews.text: We use dawn dish soap in our house and it seems to either be too think or clog regularly. We have to continually rinse the spout under hot water to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Chatman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!! Will buy more...great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love it...great product!! Plan to buy more & I think this will make a great Christmas gift...order & ship right to their doors...
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: These work great. We have them for body wash, hand soap and my husband's 3 in hair body cleanser. It works perfectly for all of them. hey look very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Froodychick

customer_reviews.title: good for 16 months
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of soap. Stopped dispensing soap 16 months later
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Dispenser works as described and the design compliments any decor. Love that there are three adjustments for the amount of soap you prefer. Sensor works great. I did need to add some water to the liquid soap, otherwise, it is difficult to dispense. The batteries are located at the top, which makes changing them a breeze. And an added plus is that it comes with a one year warranty should problems arise.
customer_reviews.author: ~ Calliope ~

customer_reviews.title: Well made soap dispenser just make sure not to use thick soap.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good dispenser. It is as seen in the picture. Love the touch less feature, you can adjust the amount of soap, and in my opinion it is one of the more modern looking soap dispensers. I have a couple of them now and have not had any major issues. I did go with a thinner soap so that the pump would work better but other than that everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: you have to touch the lid to even get some out.
customer_reviews.author: rachellann

product_meta.title: Secura Automatic Soap Dispenser 350ML / 11.8OZ Premium Touchless Battery Operated Electric Dispensers w/Adjustable Soap Dispensing Volume Control, Black
feature_bullets: Touchless operation provides for easy, hygienic dispensing of soap.
On/Off switch and adjustable soap dispenser volume control switch, from 0.05~0.15 oz. per activation.
Water Resistant Battery operated automatic soap dispenser with 11.5 oz. capacity container. Footprint save!
Infrared sensor detects your hand from as far away as 3.9 inches.
Attractive and Stylish High Quality chrome and black finish, clear soap containe, anti-leakage.1-year Manufacturer’s warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
